name: melobeats
description: A web application for converting YouTube videos and Spotify tracks to MP3.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c green,blue "npm --prefix frontend run dev" "npm --prefix backend run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c green,blue "npm --prefix frontend run build" "npm --prefix backend run build"
scripts.preview: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c green,blue "npm --prefix frontend run preview" "npm --prefix backend run start"
